website_summaries.verdict: Simple, inexpensive, and colorful, this boombox isn’t as impressive as its competition, but if you need a decent-sounding CD player or radio, it’s worth the low price of entry.
pros: Built-in AM/FM radio and CD player
Includes AUX jack for playing music from smartphones and other devices
cons: It’s a shame it doesn’t include a radio antenna

customer_reviews.title: Bag for your Boom Box!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got the radio today and immediately turned it on. The music was loud and clear. The player is medium size, I order it in a rose colored pink color, which is very attractive. I placed it right on the shelf in my office where it comfortably sits. It has a CD compartment, FM/AM radio and even has a outlet so that you can attach your MP3 player or cell phone. I really lucked out because I needed a CD player in hurry so I purchased this one for a little over twenty dollars got it in a day and half and I luv' it so much. This thing is sooooo.... cute. Luv' It!!! In my opinion Lisa's Choice
customer_reviews.author: Lisa the Beauty PixieTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this simple CD player for my Mom ( she lives in an Assisted Living community) , it worked for about 2 months then stopped playing. I lost the return window timeframe. I just ordered another one exactly the same because my mom is used to working this player. I hope this one last longer than first. If not I will not purchase again. Very disappointing to have a product work for only 2 months and no recourse to get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Ann

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive item pictured in listing
customer_reviews.text: Item is not as pictured. I wanted a split pink stereo for my daughters room, just like in the picture. Instead I received a mostly black stereo with a “pink” front that looks to be a completely different model. The model numbers actually match, so amazon either has the description and picture wrong, or the manufacturer completely changed the product without changing the model number. UPDATE: 5 months after purchasing the CD player it no longer reads CDs. It spins up and down several times for about 30 seconds then says "No" on the LCD screen.
customer_reviews.author: lot

customer_reviews.title: Defective upon Arrival
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this stereo from the 'Easter bunny'. All out the box and set up next to her basket, she was ecstatic to have her own CD player. We plug it in and the power button doesn't even work. DEFECTIVE RIGHT OUT THE BOX! Of course, the easter bunny doesn't have the packaging and he doesn't take returns. Ugh! So frustrating. We have to turn it off only by unplugging.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerjayde

customer_reviews.title: Cute but didn't last. CDs skip right away
customer_reviews.text: I am editing my review. My first review gave 3 stars as a CD began to skip but not both. I recently ordered 2 from Amazon and after playing once, both skip and can't play now. Just purchased. And out of 4 CDs, all 4 are now skipping. Was delivered July 5, and today is Sept 3. Didn't last long. Using for infant's room for bed and nap time music. Found a radio station for now but don't know how long that will last. Not happy since I don't know what to choose and will it keep working? This didn't last long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: For $30 Great Portable CD Player
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is what you might expect from this price point, but I expected that before ordering so no stars off for that. I wanted a cd player that would repeat the entire cd and one that runs on batteries (as well as plugs in). This fits the bill. FYI - If you want to use the stereo/cd player with batteries, you have to unattach the power cord from the boombox, not just unplug it.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Wastefull JUNK, TRASH, CHEAP, CHEAP CHEAP JUNK. WARRANTY IS A JOKE.
customer_reviews.text: Sylvania SRCD243 Portable CD Player with AM/FM Radio, Boombox (Pink) Brand: CURTIS Piece of CRAP. Bought warranty. Stopped working after 4 hours (Non Consecutive hours). In addition, the buttons never worked, they are just for show, there is no movement to delineate BUTTONS ARE ON or Off. Only the bottom ON button works wherein it is IN a bit more when pushed in to turn on and out a bit more when machine is Off.- BUT MACHINE STILL RUNS,EVEN WITH BUTTON IN OFF POSITION. Also, the Lights to buttons never worked...Tried to return it, but no is the answer. My honest opinion, it is a WASTE OF MONEY AND TIME a cheap item, probably a fake replica made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use .Function buttons clear and to the point.
customer_reviews.text: So many times through the years I have bought CD players that had no start, stop, play etc. buttons. Just a crazy path of weird marked buttons to memorize. There is a manual but it is a joke! Text is so small you need 20/20 vision to read it. My 83 year eyes can only see a thin gray line instead of text. Fortunately, the function buttons on this cute little machine are clear and to the point so you don't need the manual. I'm giving it 5 stars for the unit it's self. Not for the useless manual!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Preschooler loves this radio/Cd player
customer_reviews.text: Great radio/CD player! Sounds is clear and loud. Radio stations pick up great. CS player functions nicely. I actually got this for my 4 year old and she is able to work it with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Melia Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Skips on most CD's
customer_reviews.text: I mainly wanted this Sylvania SRCD243 Portable CD Player with AM/FM Radio, Boombox (Pink) that I purchased in July 2019 to play my brand NEW CD's. I do love the pink color. I have not used the AM/FM radio function so I cannot comment on that function. At first my NEW CD's played just fine. Now that it is past the 30 day Amazon Return period, this player skips on almost every CD on my favorite songs as well. I predict that this CD will stop playing altogether in the next month or so. The sound and volume are okay. However, I regret I ever purchased this item. Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I suppose you get what you pay for. We ordered this but the product that was sent to us was not the same it doesn't match it's a completely different color and doesn't have all the same buttons, I ordered this for a second time because our first one broke. It is completely different than the first one even though I ordered the exact same one. Very disappointed. It's cheaply made and barely works.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Rought

customer_reviews.title: Ok price, quality very good
customer_reviews.text: Price great, but the picture shows an antenna, yet it didn't come with one, nor did the 2nd one I ordered replacing the first one, because it didn't have an antenna as pictured. I was assured the 2nd one would have an antenna during an online chat with Amazon. I gave up & kept the 2nd one even though no antenna. It therefore only gets good reception on the radio near a window or outside, vs. maybe 1 or 2 stations in the middle of the house. It's CD player works well so far & the young girls I bought it for, love the pink color
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L Mardesich

customer_reviews.title: Great little CD player
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my six year old daughter and it is perfect for her. It’s small enough to fit on her night stand but loud enough to fill her room with music. Is it the most perfect sound I’ve ever heard? No, but it does have great sound and serves its purpose of playing her favorite soundtracks. Satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: amcg

customer_reviews.title: Update: didn’t last 6 months. Does not look like picture
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: lasted less than 6 months. What a shame and waste of money. Just got this as a replacement for the exact same one I purchased in 2016. However, the color is NOT as shown. Instead of being all pink, it is black with just the front being pink. It is also very light pink as opposed to the darker pink shown in amazon picture. My daughter is very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money. Broke after 2 1/2 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item back in September now it’s December and it’s broken. Can’t return it as I’m out of the window, contacted amazon to see if it’s under manufacturer warranty, was told to send an email to the company to makes them and I the email address they gave me isn’t even valid. Really bummed cause it’s just garbage now. Doesn’t read CDS even after cleaning the laser and blowing it out with canned air. Don’t waste your money. Spend a little extra for a better quality. Because now it’s just trash. Can’t return it and can’t even get ahold of the company who makes it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Berger

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.text: Completely died two weeks after we gave it to our daughter for her birthday ☹️ The return window is only ONE month after ordering apparently (VERY SHORT!!). I bought it early so window is now closed for return. I do NOT RECOMMEND!!! I don’t even get a chance to see if it was just this one. I’m guessing due to the short return window they knew this would happen. Shady!
customer_reviews.author: mpd

customer_reviews.title: Great for my desk at work
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for my desk. Had been looking for a "boom box" like this where the speakers are on the front, not the side, to better direct the music. Good reception and I like the dial tuner vs digital push button. Value buy at the price as I didn't need something fancy for work. Would be a good gift for a kid. Love the hot pink color.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Dill

customer_reviews.title: No  radio station  indicator  /not  so
customer_reviews.text: it's cute compact and works ok BUT neither the am nor the fm radio frequencies have an indicator! you have to do a station search by hand and listen for the stations to give their call letters over the air- you don't want this unless you enjoy radio searching what a joke poor purchase for radio listening..... Found it post review! tiny numbers on the station finder knob.....just awkward but does work. adding stats to the review.
customer_reviews.author: sally forth

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: *Update: after few months, both no longer play CDs. Worthless to us now. Would save your money and buy something of better quality. Was a bit nervous based on other reviews, but I purchased 2 of these, a pink for daughter and blue for son. They have been used now nearly daily well over a few months and these have provided HOURS of entertainment for our kids! They actually play in their room alone, using their imaginations, and not zoned on an electronic device just listening to their music. WIN!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Mueller

customer_reviews.title: What a Mistake
customer_reviews.text: THIS RADIO HAS NEVER WORKED. iT HAS NO SOUND AND NOTHING ON IT WORKS.I CALLED INTO THE 800# ON THE BACK OF THE RADIO AND THEY SAID THEY WOULD TELL ME WHAT TO DO. NOOP THEY NEVER EMAILED ME OR CALLED. I NEEED TO SEND IT BACK. WORTHLESS . UNHAPPY CUSTOMER. RUBY SMITH 2692 WILLOWLAWN STREET ROANOKE,VIRGINIA 24018 530-990-6712
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Smith. Don't know how to do that.

customer_reviews.title: Works,sounds fine.
customer_reviews.text: Since the minute it arrived,I had been trying to get it to turn on. Then,suddenly today it decided to work.So,until I can get my excellent stereo system out of storage,this will do. The sound isn't tinny.I am playing some classical music,and can hear every instrument nicely. Now satisfied with the little pink boom-box.
customer_reviews.author: ellafan

customer_reviews.title: Actual product doesn’t match images
customer_reviews.text: What we received did not match the image of what I ordered but it appears this may be the newer model. It seems even smaller than what is pictured in the image for the product page. It is working well even on old or scratched CDs All CDs no longer work. Had to go dig out an old player we had buried in the basement. That one worked. Of course it was about a week past the return date. May still try to pursue warrantee route. I do not recommend buying this player at all!
customer_reviews.author: Retoocs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you're looking for a CD player that is cute and sounds great!!
customer_reviews.text: So little and cute just like the picture. I love the color too. I got this not for the radio, so I haven't really listened to it, but for the CD player. It sounds so good and its a really good price. I got on a sale, but it wouldn't matter, its worth it. Its cute and didn't take up hardly any room. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great if adults will be using it or closely supervising it.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 of these one for my home and one for the grandchildren to use at their home. The one at my home lasted about a year before it stopped playing for no reason that we could ascertain. The one the grandchildren took to their house and they operated lasted about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry King

customer_reviews.title: cheap made.  wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Cheap made and couldn't get the radio to play well. CD worked, but the overall sound wasn't good. The cheaper model that Walmart sells was much better. Got my refund with no questions. Amazon should stop selling this as I would have preferred to pay more if I had to to get a better one. Something between this model and a panasonic and would cost around $30. This was cheap and that's all I could say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Norman D. Marton

customer_reviews.title: My niece loves her boombox!
customer_reviews.text: I gave my 10 year old niece one of these for her birthday. She loves it! It's very easy for her to use. The radio comes in fairly well. The CD player works well. The boombox is compact making it very easy for my niece to place it on her bedtime table. I liked the fact that the boombox comes in pink. The boombox is a good gift for kids ages 7 and up.
customer_reviews.author: PeteJ17

customer_reviews.title: A child favorite
customer_reviews.text: This CD player and AM/FM Radio was given to my god daughter, by her own request, on the occasion of her 11th birthday. She longed for a good CD player to play her CDs she had received for past birthdays and Christmases, as well as having a radio to listen to in-between. A previous player she owned had been damaged by one of her siblings, leaving her w/o a player or something to just listen to. This player met both of her wishes in a happy and joyous way, and she can't put it down.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, will ruin older CDs
customer_reviews.text: This thing ruined one of my favorite CDs. It worked great at first, but then the CD started to skip. I opened it up to find a powdered substance all over my CD and the inside of the CD player. It turns out the CD rubs against the inside of the CD player, and it rubbed the paint off. Not just a little bit of paint, but so much that it looks like someone opened the thing up and dumped a tablespoon of flour into it. Absolutely do not recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Webster

customer_reviews.title: Good sound! First one arrived defective and they sent ...
customer_reviews.text: Good sound! First one arrived defective and they sent a replacement. It’s perfect for our young daughters room but it has a terrible electrical smell when it’s on so we’ve since taken it out of her room. I’ve only smelled this on old electronics so I’m surprised this is having that smell in the back making me think it’s over heating. We do use it a lot of the day so I’m thinking that it needs to be used less.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline.r.

customer_reviews.title: Started skipping all CDs after two months
customer_reviews.text: While I loved the look and functionality of this player initially, after two months of use nightly by my daughter it has started to skip so badly we cannot use the CD player function anymore. She uses it to listen to books on CD as she goes to sleep, so the CD function is the whole reason we purchased this player! Very disappointed. We tried cleaning the CDs and changing to multiple different CDs to see if that was the issue, but it appears to be the player itself.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: CD part already broke after owning for just a month!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't you know that now that the return window is closed (Jan 31) cds will not play in the boombox. I really liked the player when it first came. Easy to use. Color pink :) so nice. But since4 I mainly bought it to play cds it is really bad that it broke. After only a month? Terrible!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mamato10

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The cd player has stopped working after only 3 months. I only wanted to use it for night time cd's to help my daughter go to sleep. I thought it might've been the older cd's we'd been using, but even the brand new cd we got today doesn't work in the player. The only reason I gave it any stars is because the radio still works. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Megan K.

customer_reviews.title: No radio antenna
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use FM radio while at work. Picture shows antenna, but in fact there is one and the quality of the radio is a lot of static since there’s no way to adjust the airwaves. Reported this to Amazon and am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Lennon

customer_reviews.title: It quit working in 4 months!
customer_reviews.text: I was so bummed when I went to use it and it would not work! I bought it in February, and you would expect it to last longer than that! My last one lasted for years! Of course, it was outside the window for returns. Very disappointed! On the good side, I liked the color and the quality of sound when it was working.
customer_reviews.author: JosieG

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I bought two of these. One plays CD’s the second won’t read any of the CD’s. They both still play the radio well. I should have checked that before my return time was up. Not the color I ordered or was pictured but I don’t really care lol. I ordered two one black and one pink (pictured hot pink cane in back with light pink) for my kids who listen to music at bedtime. Works great for what I ordered it for and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cbobbitt

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 4 year old to listen to stories from the library. She is pretty gentle with things but within a few days the buttons recessed and fell into the machine from pretty light use. It shouldn't have happened even with a firm touch, so we had to return.
customer_reviews.author: K.S

customer_reviews.title: Needs remote! Otherwise good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Had for several months now, works great for my 4 year old, easy for her to click through to the songs she wants, however I did not realize it didn't come with a remote. That would have been 5 stars for me. Really annoyed it doesn't have one!! Seems like a basic function.
customer_reviews.author: Jomann

customer_reviews.title: One flaw!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice radio for my kitchen BUT the station selector is a black bar on a black background and I have to shine a flashlight on it to tell where I am on the dial. I don't think I can get the cover off the selector to put some white paint on it. Fortunately I listen to the same station all the time but when I do want something else it is pain.
customer_reviews.author: Jan T.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for very long
customer_reviews.text: Player looked nice and was inexpensive, however the CD portion of the player stopped working within the first 2 weeks. The radio continued to work fairly well, but I had purchased it mostly for the CD player. I should have contacted the seller once it stopped working but I was hoping my husband could fix it. I recommend looking at a different item. If you do order and have a problem, notify Amazon and the seller right away.
customer_reviews.author: connie joels

customer_reviews.title: Player doesn't work - piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this CD player for my "guest room" two months ago, but never opened it until I had guests. Costly mistake, because the Player does not work. Radio is scratchy and CD Player skips. The ad says they have a "return date". Never heard of such a thing, but says I can't return it because it has been in the box for 2 months. I will also stop buying anything made in China. Joyce
customer_reviews.author: joyce Pa

customer_reviews.title: Stops working
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this a 4 Star review, but am changing it. My first unit died after a few months, and the replacement overheated by simply playing a cd a few times in a row and died after 9 months. The cd that was in it as well as the lens were hot to the touch. Certainly a fire hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Allison H

customer_reviews.title: Not kid proof...
customer_reviews.text: This boombox served the purpose as it was easy enough to use by a 5 year old - however, that said, she was also able to break it and after she ripped off the top of the CD player it no longer worked (I bought this specific one because you just have to lift the lid of the CD player versus tap for it to open but that proved to be it's demise)... This is obviously not the players fault but I wanted to give other purchasers a heads up that it may not be durable enough for a child.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: A pink radio - cool
customer_reviews.text: A great radio, cd player for my office. I now can play my relaxing CD's while I work. Helps lower the stress level. The sound quality is acceptable and the pink color makes me smile when I look at it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria D'agostino

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: For a small, inexpensive boombox, this thing is great. There's no bass control and the like, but it plays CDs CDs doesn't skip if you move it. I've used it in a moving car. You can use battery or plug in. Overall, a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Schobitz

customer_reviews.title: Good for a first timer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice my daughter loved the color. Issues I had with it is that I bumped her shelf and the cd skipped. With the technology today that should be fixed and not an issue. Other than that my kid is pleased not bad if your buying it for a first timer. I will definitely upgrade it in the future to something more durable
customer_reviews.author: RMcGraugh

customer_reviews.title: Not great, but adequate
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love this, but I bought it with the hopes that they could plug in headphones and listen to audio books on CD... and once you plug in headphones, it automatically turns off. I wish it worked as it promises, but my daughters still like it. Super cheap cd player - in price and quality. But it plays adequately when plugged in and without headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Team Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, worth the price and quickly delivered
customer_reviews.text: seriously adorable and exactly what I wanted. Something cute and small. Thank God for honest neighbors because it was delivered to them from the post office instead of me initially.
customer_reviews.author: Candystwin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome radio
customer_reviews.text: This radio is actually louder than i expected because of the reviews I've read about it,unless you're looking for a party stereo.But I'm very satisfied and would definitely recommend this one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: HappyMommy86

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy - 2nd unit to fail within 2 months of ownership.
customer_reviews.text: We have now purchased 2 of these--- and each only lasted 2 months before the CD players started malfunctioning. Since the warranty is so bad from Curtis, my credit card insurance paid for replacements. I will not be getting a third.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great little box with radio and cd player..
customer_reviews.text: Great little player for the price.. Bought this for my little girl's room. Have not tried to use with batteries - only plugged into the wall. The volume levels are great for what we use it for. Have had it now for a couple of months, use it nightly, and no issues at all. Radio and CD work well and hold up to a 6 year old poking at it, changing disks, etc. It is on the small side so if you are looking for a bigger box, you will want to skip this one, but if not - this could be your machine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Sylvania SRCD243 Portable CD player we’ve bought. The first one works fine. It’s simple enough for our 2 and 5 year olds to operate. The second one started started to act suspicious within the first month. Now it doesn’t work at all. Having the same problem as the person in the video. I’m sure it’s too late to return it now, which is a real bummer.
customer_reviews.author: I. Temple

customer_reviews.title: Quit playing cds after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: The CD player quit playing cds after a few weeks of use. Super disappointed but it’s a cheaper player so oh well. I thought maybe it would last if we only used it in the evenings for bedtime stories but nope!
customer_reviews.author: JenniAnne Holmes

customer_reviews.title: so this is perfect. She is 6 and I am working on ...
customer_reviews.text: cute CD and radio player. My daughter is young and does not need anything fancy, so this is perfect. She is 6 and I am working on having her listen to meditation CD's at night when she goes to bed and she sleeps very sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of these CD players I've ordered because I liked it in green and wanted two for convenience. Not long after I received the pink one, the green one died--and the pink one shortly thereafter. "Error" message, no matter what. Additionally, it's nearly impossible to use with batteries because the battery cover doesn't stay on (unless you enjoy juggling batteries!). I'm hoping that I'll be happier with a different model, which I'm ordering now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but Aux port is defective!
customer_reviews.text: This little boom box is cute and lightweight. I received mine and it seemed to work fine for CDs.. But the Aux connector does not work. Tried and tried and can't get it to work. I'm pretty bummed out as this was a gift for my daughter who plugs in her cellphone to listen to music.
customer_reviews.author: Mariel Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple of months and so far everything works fine. The sounds good. The radio works. And it's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Barney

customer_reviews.title: Very bad product
customer_reviews.text: This cd player worked for less than ONE WEEK. I like to play a classical cd 24/7 and never take it out. Well this gadget couldn't handle that. I wish someone tell me what cd player i can buy that can play the same wonderful baroque cd for days, months, years without stopping - or dying ...
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L. Bens

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a week then died. Couldn't be fixed. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: michelle moody

customer_reviews.title: We bought one for each of our daughters. Within ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought one for each of our daughters. Within a week, the volume was unable to be adjusted on one of them. It was dialed all the way down (should have been no sound) and was booming loud. The handle on the other one snapped off in one month- despite having been sitting on a desk and picked up that one time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: This little boombox gets the job done...I needed to test my students' listening skills and our computers/laptops no longer have a CD/DVD compartment so I needed something in a hurry (thank you amazon prime!) and that wouldn't break the bank. I was skeptical because of the low price but am very happy with my purchase. Acceptable quality and the volume goes higher than we need it!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Two stereos broke after 1-2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the first one as the CD player stopped reading CDs after 1 month of use... then the second one did the same thing after 2 months of use! Of course that's after warranty expires so now I"m stuck with it. Bummer as otherwise it was a great little stereo for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Lorubo

customer_reviews.title: One month and broken
customer_reviews.text: Received this CD player exactly one month ago. It is used in my daughter's room at night, playing gentle piano music on repeat while she sleeps. The last few nights when I've checked on her, the music has been off. Now tonight I tried turning it back on to set at repeat and the player was making an awful clunking sound. Wouldn't even start any music! ONE month and it already doesn't work. Piece of junk!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter for her Bday in August it worked just fine until a week ago.CD player won't work at all And of course this is after I could get a refund.Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: August H.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of.... well you know!
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to buy this with all the bad reviews hoping that it would work for my daughter. Well total waste of time. Glad Amazon makes it easy to return. The CD player does not work. Please look elsewhere if your wanting a basic radio with CD player.
customer_reviews.author: Carl canady

customer_reviews.title: player never worked
customer_reviews.text: these cheap little players mean sometimes you just get what you pay for. silver ball bearings fell through and player worked for 5 weeks, missed the return window. not much of a warranty. off to WalMart.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Niece loves it
customer_reviews.text: Giving this perfect stars because it was perfect for why I got it - it was for my 3 year old niece! She loves it! Perfect size , color and easy for her to use
customer_reviews.author: ChristiGriff

customer_reviews.title: Great stero
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter's birthday and she loves it. It works great and she can listen to her CDs in her room now. The pink color was an added bonus as it's her favorite color.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4 yr. she knew how to work it right away. She is so happy and now can play her story book cd's on her own. She loves the independence. It also comes with cord so you can plug it in or use batteries. Great buy and price you can't beat it
customer_reviews.author: Pookie

customer_reviews.title: This is a MINI cd player.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a larger cd player, but pleasantly surprised when I took out of the package. perfect for a mom with no skills in "the higher technology". She loves the player and the color!
customer_reviews.author: Lorri G.

customer_reviews.title: Returning. Stopped working after 24hrs.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped playing CD after the 1st day?! Also I noticed it is not safe for little ones. You could actually touch the spinning cd disc, which would probably break it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah the mommy

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was pink, for my daughter's room. Big mistake. The CD player part quit working about 10 months in. My Sony boombox is 20 years old and still going strong. Save your money, don't care about color, and buy a better quality machine.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: I consider this boombox to be really nice for the money. Not sorry I bought it. I like small sizes to keep clutter down. All in all a perfect purchase because the sound is really good for the price and small speakers.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice little boom box
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Fits perfectly on my dresser without taking up much space. Good for listening to the radio or cds. Not the best quality of sound but it works for listening at a medium volume level.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer 14

customer_reviews.title: Broken straight out of the box, pass on this piece of trash
customer_reviews.text: So I got this the other day and pulled it out of the box and disappointment is not what I'd use to describe this item. This is basically a piece of trash. The speakers crackle uncontrollably at random intervals and you get weird grinding noises when ever a CD is playing. By grinding noises I don't mean the normal CD spin sound or even 90's era CD drive sounds, it's like the parts are mismatched. Do yourself a favor and pass on this.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Townzen

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well...For the First Year
customer_reviews.text: CD player worked well in my daughter’s room, playing CDs as she feel asleep. But it stopped working just over one year after I purchased it. Doesn’t seem like any electronics are made to last anymore, so I would suggest spending the extra $2 to get an extended warranty if you plan to use it for more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: tigirl03

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of what the quality would be like since it is inexpensive, however, I was pleasantly surprised. When I first played a CD, it did skip several times then the player corrected itself. The sound is very good. Very cute and small unlike the boom boxes of years past.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Wren

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The CD player part has not worked since we got it. Radio works fine but I purchased this for my daughter so she could practice her chorus songs. It will not read any of the CDs. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KWimbish

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 1 week
customer_reviews.text: Had it one week and already broken. Worked fine at first, was just what I wanted, something simple for my daughters room. Now 1 week later the display screen and all the buttons on the front don't work. Had no harsh treatment, wasn't dropped, or spilled on. It immediately went on the top of a tall dresser safe and sound. Hoping they will replace since it broke already.
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: This fit the description and is working great. She loves that it is pink
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's room as she listens to music during nap and at bedtime. I wanted something inexpensive and moveable! This fit the description and is working great. She loves that it is pink. I love that it has a replay feature so I could play a CD over continuously through her nap. I will likely purchase another for my other daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Broken!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these - one for each of my daughters (ages 10 months and 3)...we only use them at night to play music when they are going to sleep. Neither of the children play with them. I was intially very happy with the purchase as my 3 year old wanted a "pink radio to play her music" . . . however, both CD players are broken with only a few months of use. One doesn't play the CD at all anymore and the other skips. If I could figure out how to return them or get a refund, I would. Unfortunately I no longer have the original boxes. A complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Pimental

customer_reviews.title: Good product. I was hoping for a little easier ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I was hoping for a little easier user interface for my daughter though. There is no off button, but a "off/radio/cd" button. The cds are not that easy to take out of the player. All in all, it will likely get some great use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my five-year-old daughter for Christmas the on and off button doesn’t work, it’s kind of annoying that you have to use the two little tiny knobs on the side to turn it on and off I thought it came with a cord to connect her iPhone It does not
customer_reviews.author: April Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Ok, doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: This is cute and worked for a while. We've had it for 11 months and probably used a few dozen times; it worked fine at first but then it started to randomly stop playing and now it won't play at all.
customer_reviews.author: NJgirlInKS

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadget
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback with this little boombox is it's nearly impossible to see the station indicator. But I only listen to one radio station or my cd's. Bought this to go in my sewing room in the garage so it's just perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: jkchristian9999

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t function on batteries
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t function on batteries alone which is a huge bummer and the sole reason I purchased this
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to play a lullaby CD in my daughter's room. The CD player quit working after only 2 months. Was only used a few hours a day, a few times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Sara M.

customer_reviews.title: Works well for that you can tell its not the highest quality CD but the sound is fine. She loves the pink color
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old for her nap time music. Works well for that you can tell its not the highest quality CD but the sound is fine. She loves the pink color
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our almost four year old for her Easter basket. It is easy to use. She can navigate it without difficulties. It has a great sound and gets fairly loud. Loud enough to hear throughout the top floor of our house. (Yes - she's 3 going on 16! Haha)
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Worked OK for a few days then display went bad.
customer_reviews.text: Worked OK out of the box, but after a week of continuous use the display would go blank (even though the CD player was still playing). After shutting it off for a while the display would work again. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Gick

customer_reviews.title: Good CD player but bad shipping
customer_reviews.text: The CD player appears to be exactly what I wanted for my granddaughter, however, I was very disappointed when it arrived in the mail and it was not in another box, the label was on the CD box and it happened that we had pouring rain all that day. The box was soaked but luckily the CD player itself was in a plastic bag and appears to be okay. I didn't like having to give a gift to someone in a box like that.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Ouellette

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a couple of months until the AC adapter plug stopped working. We bought new batteries to put in it which only lasted 2 days before it stopped working a second time. We bought another AC adapter thinking that was the problem, but it still didn’t work. If it wasn’t too late, I would return it!! Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY WEGNER

customer_reviews.title: CD player only worked once
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would be a good fit for my daughter, but the CD player worked the first time we plugged it in, and never again after that (though the radio continue to work!). We returned it, and wouldn't purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Christensen

customer_reviews.title: DON'T DO IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cd player is awful! I bought it to play audio books while my kids slept. It worked for maybe 2 weeks and then would skip every cd put in it. The disks were all brand new and still skipped every time. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Mrsschut

customer_reviews.title: 1 star
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly for 1 day then didn't play anymore.So bad because I was expecting to leave in my daughter bedroom to she sleeps with music all night. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Misses Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 11yr old. She was wanting something to listen to music on. She loves it. Volume control is great she keeps it on very low at night when she sleeps.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly DeCamp

customer_reviews.title: cd player never worked
customer_reviews.text: radio worked great. Cd player never worked from the moment we unboxed it.
customer_reviews.author: gabi.izzys_mom

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy and Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: We got this today as a gift for our young daughter. It is quite flimsy and arrived with 2 of the 3 buttons on the front of the boom box already broken off (the box and shipping package were pristine so this surely did not happen during transit). Very disappointing as it is cute as a button on the surface. Also, this unit does not have a headphone jack...another big turn-off. Needless to say it's being shipped back tomorrow (thank goodness for Amazon return policies!).
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Stafford

customer_reviews.title: CD player does not Work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this radio less than three months ago and already the CD player no longer works. It is a piece of junk!! If you are looking for something to play CD's on, DO NOT purchase this radio!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: soothing
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to listen to while I am sitting outside. This just hit it. I needed it to be easy to use and it is.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Parker

customer_reviews.title: Small but gets job done
customer_reviews.text: Very basic radio. Got it for the CD player. Cute and my 5 year old loves having it in the room. Quality of volume is okay nothing extraordinary.
customer_reviews.author: Jedi Master

product_meta.title: Sylvania SRCD243 Portable CD Player with AM/FM Radio, Boombox (Pink)
product_meta.description: Color:PinkSylvania Portable CD Radio features, AM/FM radio, CD-R compatible CD player, Skip Search functions, 20 track programmable memory, and AC/DC adapter. Outdoor Antenna Grounding - If an outside antenna is connected to the receiver, be sure the antenna system is grounded so as to provide some protection against voltage surges and built up static charges
feature_bullets: Portable CD Boombox with AM/FM Radio
Aux In Jack – Allows You to Play Music From Any Audio Device
This unit operates on 8 X ‘C’ (UM-2) size batteries or from the included AC120V/60Hz line power supply

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars5,181 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
